definitions.definition: A shoot that grows along the ground and produces roots at its nodes ; a runner .
A structure formed by some colonial organisms from which offspring are produced by budding , found in bryozoans , pterobranchs , some corals , and other invertebrates.
A hypha that acts as a runner , connecting sporangiophores .

main_definition: ( botany ) A shoot that grows along the ground and produces roots at its nodes ; a runner .
secondary_definitions: ( zoology ) A structure formed by some colonial organisms from which offspring are produced by budding , found in bryozoans , pterobranchs , some corals , and other invertebrates.
( mycology ) A hypha that acts as a runner , connecting sporangiophores .
